shop.name: shop
shop.description: Open the shop to buy items.

inventory.name: inventory
inventory.description: Show your egg inventory or another user's.

leaderboard.name: leaderboard
leaderboard.description: Check the top collectors and strongest hives.

encyclopedia.name: encyclopedia
encyclopedia.description: Show all eggs and their stats.

collect.name: collect
collect.description: Collect a spawned egg from the channel.

eggs.name: eggs
eggs.description: Manage your egg collection (list, info, destroy).

nextspawn.name: nextspawn
nextspawn.description: Show time until the next egg spawn for this server.

hive create.name: hive create
hive create.description: Start creating a hive if you meet the requirements for at least one type. Options are presented interactively.

hive delete.name: hive delete
hive delete.description: Permanently delete your hive and all its data. This is irreversible.

hive type info.name: hive type info
hive type info.description: Show information about different hive types and their requirements.

hive events.name: hive events
hive events.description: Show recent events in your hive (battles, evolutions, etc).

hive defend.name: hive defend
hive defend.description: Defend against an ongoing attack on your hive.

hive modules.name: hive modules
hive modules.description: View all modules and their levels.

hive module upgrade.name: hive module upgrade
hive module upgrade.description: Upgrade a hive module to improve your hive's stats.

hive queen-status.name: hive queen-status
hive queen-status.description: Check the status of your hive queen (health, energy, etc).

hive queen-upgrade.name: hive queen-upgrade
hive queen-upgrade.description: Upgrade your hive queen to increase your hive's potential.

egg info.name: egg info
egg info.description: Show detailed information about an egg you own.

egg destroy.name: egg destroy
egg destroy.description: Permanently destroy an egg in your inventory. This is irreversible.

eggs list.name: eggs list
eggs list.description: List all eggs in your inventory.

eggs hatch.name: eggs hatch
eggs hatch.description: Hatch an egg to get a xenomorph. Requires an available hive slot.

eggs sell.name: eggs sell
eggs sell.description: Sell an egg from your inventory for credits.

evolve start.name: evolve start
evolve start.description: Start an evolution for one of your xenomorphs to evolve into a new form. Requires selecting a target role and consuming resources.

evolve list.name: evolve list
evolve list.description: List all your xenomorphs and their current evolution status.

evolve info.name: evolve info
evolve info.description: Show detailed information about an ongoing evolution or the requirements for a potential evolution.

evolve cancel.name: evolve cancel
evolve cancel.description: Cancel an ongoing evolution. Some resources may be refunded depending on how far along the evolution is.

info.name: info
info.description: Show system, tech, and global stats.

vote.name: vote
vote.description: Vote for the bot on top.gg.

setup.name: setup
setup.description: Manage bot settings for this server

forcespawn.name: forcespawn
forcespawn.description: Force spawn eggs in the configured channel (admin only)

devget.name: devget
devget.description: Get runtime config or env value (owner only)

devset.name: devset
devset.description: Set config value and update runtime (owner only)

previewjoin.name: previewjoin
previewjoin.description: Preview the guild join embed in this channel (owner only)

checkcommands.name: checkcommands
checkcommands.description: Check whether slash commands are registered in this guild

devgive.name: devgive
devgive.description: Give credits to a user (owner only)

trade.name: trade
trade.description: Trade eggs or xenomorphs with another player.

gift.name: gift
gift.description: Gift an egg or xenomorph to another player.
